title: Mountain Brook
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Purchased with funds provided by Mrs. Herbert A. Vance; fund of an anonymous donor; Wesley M. Colburn, Mr. and Mrs. Stanley Feinberg, Field Museum of Natural History, Mr. and Mrs. Frank Harding, International Minerals and Chemicals Corp., Mr. and Mrs. Ralph Loeff, Mrs. Frank C.
